thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Hardy

author: Hardy
title: Hardy
text: All other sites that give you Quote: s give you the TOTAL price you will pay at pick-up. Rentalcars.com gives you the "hire price." You'll find that all the excise taxes and other fees will be added on AFTER you go to pick-up your car. I prefer to know what the TOTAL will be before I pick-up and this is the only way to truly compare prices offered by other sites and avoid costly surprises. My first and last Rentalcars.com booking.
